import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { GraduationCap, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin, ArrowRight, Send, CheckCircle, ChevronUp } from 'lucide-react'; const Footer: React.FC = () => { const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(''); const [isSubscribed, setIsSubscribed] = useState(false); const [showScrollTop, setShowScrollTop] = useState(false); const handleNewsletterSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); if (email) { // Simulate newsletter subscription setIsSubscribed(true); setEmail(''); setTimeout(() => setIsSubscribed(false), 3000); } }; const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); }; useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const scrollTop = window.pageYOffset; setShowScrollTop(scrollTop > 300); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
